Revision septoplasty.context: Revision septoplasty, repair of internal nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage, repair of bilateral external nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage, harvest of right auricular cartilage.

Nasal septal deviation.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Nasal septal deviation. 2. Bilateral internal nasal valve collapse. 3. Bilateral external nasal valve collapse.

Bilateral internal nasal valve collapse.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Nasal septal deviation. 2. Bilateral internal nasal valve collapse. 3. Bilateral external nasal valve collapse.

Bilateral external nasal valve collapse.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Nasal septal deviation. 2. Bilateral internal nasal valve collapse. 3. Bilateral external nasal valve collapse.

49-year-old gentleman.context: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s.

significant upper airway resistance.context: He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

nasal obstruction.context: He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.context: He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

significantly deviated septum.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

significant septal spur.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

bilateral internal as well as external n.context: There is also evidence of bilateral internal as well as external nasal valve collapse.
